title: AZA_21M
author: AZA_21M
content: To all Bitcoin pleb out there! To film- / movie- / video-makers, creators and cinema fans alike. Save the date: Apr 19-21, 2024. Join us in Warsaw, Poland, at the European Halving Party and the 2nd edition of Bitcoin FilmFest.Let’s meet to count down and to celebrate! To raise a toast to halving! To hang out with OGs and fellow pleb! To immerse ourselves in stimulating conversations, unique film screenings, workshops, panels, and more... Simply put, Europe's biggest plebeian gathering - organized by Bitcoiners, for Bitcoiners, with Bitcoiners.Tick tok next block... Block #840,000. See you in Warsaw, Poland. The halving is coming and so should you!- date: 2024-04-19 - 2024-04-21- title: "European Halving Party & Bitcoin FilmFest 2024"- venue: "Warsaw, Poland™ - The Palace of Culture and Science (PL abbreviated PKiN)"- address: " plac Defilad 1, 00-901 Warszawa"- city: "Warsaw, Warszawa"- country: "Poland"- link #1: "https://europeanhalvingparty.com/"- link #2: https://bitcoinfilmfest.com/Bitcoin FilmFest: A Sneak-Peek into the Future and the Past...  Building on the success of the inaugural edition of Bitcoin FilmFest Warsaw in March 2023, and mini editions held during various conferences around the globe, we are thrilled to bring you another extraordinary fest. The unique few days at the intersection of Bitcoin, film culture and art, which this time will coincide with one of the most significant moments, happening only once every 4 years - the Bitcoin Halving. Thus, in 2024, we are organizing a joint event, combining Bitcoin FilmFest and the European Halving Party. Bitcoin-Only. Come to see for yourself. Don’t regret waiting another four years!--- STAY IN TOUCH: #BFF #BitcoinFilmFest #EuropeanHalvingParty #EHP2024 ---Telegram https://t.me/+yfXLveSIRsw3YTJkNostr https://primal.net/profile/npub1rjtrs7xqdvj3588r9njrexh2n750j7jdwx9qs543nutmdsj6ljaqpfmp8a
